question: Which of the following article was added to Indian Constitution by 25th amendment act , which gives the directive principles in article 39 (b) and ( c) primacy over fundamental rights guaranteed under article 14 & 19 of the Indian Constitution?
explanation: Article 31-C was added to Indian Constitution by 25th Amendment Act, which gives the directive principles in article 39 (b) and (c) primacy over fundamental rights guaranteed under article 14 & 19 of the Indian Constitution.
